mapper.select: SELECT t_subject.subject_name, t_subject.subject_id, t_subject.parent_id FROM t_subject
mapper.insert: insert into t_subject ( t_subject.subject_name, t_subject.parent_id) values ( #{subjectName}, #{parentId} )
mapper.select: SELECT t_subject.subject_name, t_subject.subject_id, t_subject.parent_id FROM t_subject WHERE t_subject.parent_id = #{parentId}

SELECT t_subject.subject_id, t_subject.subject_name, Avg(t_score.score) AS score FROM t_subject INNER JOIN t_exam_session ON t_exam_session.subject_id = t_subject.subject_id INNER JOIN t_session_papers_student ON t_session_papers_student.exam_session_id = t_exam_session.id INNER JOIN t_score ON t_score.papers_id = t_session_papers_student.papers_id GROUP BY t_subject.subject_id

SELECT t_subject.subject_id, t_subject.subject_name, Max(t_score.score) AS score FROM t_subject INNER JOIN t_exam_session ON t_exam_session.subject_id = t_subject.subject_id INNER JOIN t_session_papers_student ON t_session_papers_student.exam_session_id = t_exam_session.id INNER JOIN t_score ON t_score.papers_id = t_session_papers_student.papers_id GROUP BY t_subject.subject_id
